name: Automatic Footer Copyright for Genesis
author: Ishan Sharma

sections.description:
This plugin adds automatic copyright information in footer of Genesis. It also removes link to Genesis and WordPress. The format is © first-post-year – current-year your-blog-name.

If year of first post is same as current year, it will display only current year.

The plugin works only with Genesis theme for now. I will add support for other theme frameworks later. If you want have any questions or feature requests, please contact us via http://wpblogexperts.com/contact-us
sections.installation: To install the plugin, download the zip file to your computer, unzip it and upload the AutoFooterCopyright folder to /wp-content/plugins folder
sections.faq:
Which themes does the plugin support?

Genesis and Genesis child themes for now.

How can I customize the text?

Text can not be changed right now. The feature will be added in future versions.
sections.changelog:
1.4

  • Declaring compatibility with WP 4.4

1.3

  • No changes. This release is just to fix a SVN problem.

1.2

  • Included “;” with &copy.
  • Fixed a bug that stopped plugin from working in some cases.

1.1

  • Minor Update: Fixed a small error with notice. Now, only copyright symbol is displayed.

short_description: Add automatic copyright information in footer of Genesis or any Genesis child theme.
